    • Calm Infusions

    Natural sleep inducing muscle relaxant

    Client

    Calm Infusions

    Industry

    Cosmetics

    Roles

    UX/UI Design

    Development

    Brief
    The company sells natural sleep inducing muscle relaxant drops. Design of the website should reflect calmness and tranquillity and use of teal color. The website should be clean and include call to action button to recieve free samples.
    color palette
    d5edef
    fdde8f
    ffa2c9
    97c9ec
    f7f7f7
    dcc8ee
    ebe3e0
    9cd7d4
    Approach
    This website was specifically designed keeping the product in mind. The design was given cool and calming look to showcase the nature of the product. The use of light colors as well as use of white spaces enhances the look and feel of the website. Easy to navigate and nig call to action buttons were added as per the brief.
